name: MEC Wanderwall Pants - Women's
description:
We affectionately call these "every woman's pants." Durable, stretchy, and most importantly, comfortable, they set the bar for breathability on the trail. But they're MEC staff favourites because they truly translate from activity to life. Gathered cuffs and a mid-rise smocked waist look as good with a tank top and flip flops as they do with a hydration pack and day hikers.Made of ripstop nylon and spandex, with recycled content. Durable water repellent (DWR) finish provides weather protection against unexpected showers.Pull-on, drawcord-style elastic waist with faux fly.2 deep front pockets.Double-layer of fabric at knees for extra durability for climbing or kneeling in a canoe.Gusseted crotch gives you range of motion to reach for footholds, sink deep into yoga poses or bound over fallen logs.Tapered fit with a trim cuff at the ankle.

Regular fit



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering




        Sustainability
